website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to standard display cabinets. Rotating makeup display can help save on space.
pros: Great for those lacking in space, the base is under 10 inches
It's very simple to adjust the layers to accommodate different size cosmetics
cons: Some users find it to be too flimsy for heavy use

customer_reviews.title: space saver, fits all in one
customer_reviews.text: I had been compares several Style make up organizor for my little table, this should be the best choice if you have different bottle style.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup rack I have ever bought. It is easy to install. It can adjust the height of each layer according to the height of the skin care product. It can also be rotated 360 degrees. It is very smooth, even if I put a lot of bottles on it. .
customer_reviews.author: jun

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This makeup organizer went together very easily and turns nicely. The shelves have a very small lip which means makeup falls off of them almost every time I turn it. The slots on top are also very shallow and don’t hold makeup brushes or eyeliner or mascara without them having to lay over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage - Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold perfume, and it does the job. It could fit all but a very few of my niche perfume bottles. I glued an organizer section from another unit I bought from Amazon on the top section that was open for brushes, etc. so I could store my perfume in travel cases. It looks great and very neat on my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: barskin

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but not practical.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this organizer after reading so many good reviews but edges are too low. My stuff is keeping to fell of when I am turning this shelf. I love only one section with the hole for tall things and this about it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: I like color
customer_reviews.text: I have so much make-up that it's easy to find when you're looking for it, and the desk doesn't look like a mess
customer_reviews.author: the one

customer_reviews.title: Check the package to see that all pieces are in now
customer_reviews.text: The product looks like it will be a good organizer however I did not get the attachment bands to hold shelves in place so they constantly slip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble! Nice large size!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! The shelves can be placed at different heights. The turntable makes it quick & easy to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: LuvOnlineShopping

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational unit
customer_reviews.text: It is great to keep face lotions and essential oils on my bathroom vanity. It is not the strongest unit but it works and it rotates which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is so flimsy. The shelves are not stable. They pop out when you place items in the sections. I wish I returned it right away. I do not recommend storing any glass products on it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bellavance

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be slightly bigger but its still a good size. I use it for hair products and other items since im not into make up. Definitely helps you organize yourself
customer_reviews.author: Lileuri

customer_reviews.title: Save space
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff, save space so my makeups are organized now. You can make it as your necessary.
customer_reviews.author: aliguigui

customer_reviews.title: save space
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been looking for a long time to buy a cosmetic box. I found it in Amazon this time. Now the make-up table is well organized and the space is big. My wife likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this. It fits so much better on my counter than my pull out drawers and it holds more things! Highly recommend for anyone with a makeup collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Zielinski

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy lemon sqeezy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store all the makeup on the vanity and it was super easy to put together and holds a lot of stuff. The adjustable shelving is really nice! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie haverkost

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Fits all my crap comfrotably and tidys up any area. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. The rack becomes stable after you attach the fixing bands. Rotates quite smoothly. Really saves a lot of space for me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Served the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it and definitely the bathroom counter looks much cleaner and well organized. I would have expected the rotation to be easier, like a light touch spin, but can understand that would affect the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Ying Wang

customer_reviews.title: Organize
customer_reviews.text: Excellent organizer, a little wobble to it but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Like the organizer
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and beautiful! I have so many make up product even more than 20 foundations and hundrads of lipsticks. The organizer help me keep makeup table clean and neat. Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, not great.
customer_reviews.text: The Lazy Susan feature is cool, but I wish there were something on the sides to keep things from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot and makes dresser look cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I needed and my dresser looks so much cleaner and organized now.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but one of the shelves is not staying put. It seems to swivel ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hack

customer_reviews.title: look great
customer_reviews.text: Things look great, but the quality is a bit worse
customer_reviews.author: Qi dong

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Like the design on the top. Fits a couple of my favorite lipsticks and a couple of brushes. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS ONE IS CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Can’t handle heavy skincare bottles. Mine bottom started cracking within a week. Not a good product. Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lilyzennawang

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!! That is sooooo convenient! I finally cleaned my table up!
customer_reviews.author: xiaoxuanyang

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Fit a lot makeups, also adjustable. Easy to rotate and use.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: five star
customer_reviews.text: Cosmetics finally have a home, this makeup rack is very practical, I like!!!
customer_reviews.author: wenling dong

customer_reviews.title: Very useful organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very useful and convenience. I put my lotion and toner on the organizer. You can organize the space by yourself, and easy install. recommend
customer_reviews.author: June Wong

customer_reviews.title: I love this makeup organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I have ever gotten this year! Everything fits where I wanted it to. It saves up TONS of space on my vanity now. It is so easy to set up. Granted that this is basically called a Lazy Susan... so this idea was pretty much already been around for a long time. Still brilliant though!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Tong

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to adjust to your needs
customer_reviews.text: This fit a purpose for me. I needed extra space for makeup, lotions..etc. I like how I could adjust the shelving to fit the needs of the containers that I had. I have had this for a year and is the same as the day I got it. If there is a slight downfall would be if the shelves was a little more stable but as long as you don't spin too fast its not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Relatively small footprint; reasonable price for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller footprint that my previous organizer. Adjustable to what you want to store. Fits easily between my sinks. Made a couple of mistakes in putting it together, but it is real easy to correct mistakes. I am very happy with this purchase. Very reasonably priced for the value you get.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Noble

customer_reviews.title: Requesting a replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this. But just 1.5 month of usage, this has happened. The bottom part of the unit cracked & crumbled by itself. This is making it difficult to rotate/revolve. It's out of the return window. So. I will be grateful, if the company send me a no cost replacement. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing so much more than those acrylic drawers, it keeps my make-up organized and I can get to it very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Diana V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Storage!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. I strongly recommend for anyone who wants to be organized and have easy access to their products and tools for that daily beauty routine. I'm definitely recommending this to my family and friends! Super great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Rocker

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small SF apartment so real estate is at a premium. This is a welcomed solution to product organization within my room! This fits ALL of my products and I was able to adjust the shelves easily to accommodate the space needed for said products. I even have some additional space if need be. I was anticipating the turning/lazy Susan feature to be a little janky, alas it turns beautifully! Piecing this together was also very simple and straight forward. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Android

customer_reviews.title: Looks dirty quickly, cute but still looks cluttered.
customer_reviews.text: Okay assembly, rubber bands are kinda tricky and make it hard to reorder things once you put them on. Its open so it still looks pretty cluttered, and the little lips dont really stop things from falling if you spin it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Maelyn Godkin

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t come with the rubber bands which are actually quite important. luckily i had something similar to use. other than that it serves its purpose well and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Pisa

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, had to use hot glue
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Both the partition pieces were cracked and or missing the lock in plastic foot. The plastics isn’t as sturdy as it looks in the picture. Thankfully I have a hot glue gun. Basically I glue this thing together to make it more stable. The idea is nice, the product just needs better quality thicker plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough, but the instructions indicated there were supposed to be rubber rings to hold the parts together, and there weren't any included. I was still able to put it together, but it seems like it could fall apart relatively easily if it were bumped or something.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love my makeup organizer it is durable and holds a lot of items. It has organized my life
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I just wish this was a little bigger. Works as expected and saves a lot of space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Tmd

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It work really well in my bathroom and It is perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Lois A. Delonge

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver, my countertop is organized than ever!
customer_reviews.author: wucool33

customer_reviews.title: Super love it
customer_reviews.text: Express delivery to my home in good condition.The product can be assembled by myself.The box looks small but it is very big to assemble.Very functional and practical .It can be hold a lot of Makeup brush , essence, lotion, cream, etc.This make-up shelf didn't make me regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fits in a small space on counter and don’t have to worry about moving it.
customer_reviews.text: Love my makeup organizer. I don’t have to search through a tray to find something. Easily can see where everything is at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda ‘“‘

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembling
customer_reviews.text: A lot easier to assemble than I imagined, and the spin feature is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good,keep things organized and make more room for the table,love it
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Could be sturdier .but it helps keep my vanity organized I'd purchase again
customer_reviews.author: TheresaTia

product_meta.title: EMOCCI Rotating Makeup Organizers 360 Adjustable Spinning Cosmetic Storage Box Case Large Capacity Make Up Holder Vanity Shelf Fits Counter top Bathroom Kitchen(Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:black-1EMOCCI is specialized in producing beauty cosmetic tools,we mainly provide all kinds of high quality makeup tools,such as makeup brushes,makeup brush holder,acrylic makeup organizer,cosmetic organizers etc.
In order to design the most convenient cosmetic collection and colorful for daily use,the rotating makeup organizer offers a large capacity storage for daily routine cosmetics and beauty tools,fits not only on vanity ,also be on travel,countertop,bathroom,bedroom,desk ect.

Makeup organizers feature:
This 360 makeup organizer use stable and strong material ABS.
Excellent space-saving,this makeup shelves can hold pretty good amount of stuffs.
Great for storing makeup sponges,toner,creams,nail polish,eyeliner,face wash,lotion,clay mask, perfume,mascara,essential oils,facial creams and many other make up accessories.
The bathroom vanity organizer design with four card slots and fit different size to adjust the storage occasion you want.
The spinning makeup organizer can use as a fantastic gift for Black Friday,Cyber Monday,Thanksgiving Day,Christmas,New Year,Valentine’s Day,Mother’s Day, birthdays and other holidays..

Glam girl organizer Specification:
1.Material: Aryclic
2.Color:Black
3.Makeup carousel organizer size:9.05"x 9.05" x 13.3" 

How to assemble:
1. Insert one of the partitions into the base plate,put it in an flat place for use.
2. Insert the other partition into the base plate.
3. Immobilize the 4 bottom joints with rubber rings.
4. Insert the roof into the partitions.
5. Insert the 4 trays into partition slots according to your needs.
6. Immobilize every parts with rubber rings.

Package include:
1 x Makeup organizer box (include 1 x top plate,1 x base plate,2 x support frame,4 x pieces card slots,rubber rings) 
1 x Instruction for assembling
feature_bullets: ❤️360 ROTATING ORGANIZER:This makeup organizers DIY design under 360 degree rotation and adjustable nice design,you can easily get what you need and for counter desk dressing bedroom traveling use.

❤️LARGER CAPACITY:This make up organizers and storage is convenient to storage makeup brushes bath products,jewelry,foundation,powders,nail polish,toner,creams,lotion,mask,personal area,eyeliner,perfume,lipsticks and cosmetics set,also the top can fit for some mini beauty tools.

❤️LAYERS ADJUSTABLE:Flexibly adjust the height with 7 layers,large capacity beauty organizers and storage allow to storage different size of makeup,beauty tools, cosmetics,bath accessories and toiletries.
❤️EASY TO INSTALL AND CLEAN:Convenient to install this beauty organizer,also can be washable and disassemble easily
❤️OUR GUARANTEE:100% quality assurance and great customer service.If any questions, please contact us anytime.
